activities.name: SP_MasterJobEnd_Success
activities.description: This stored procedure receives the MasterProcessNumber as input and updates the status of the MasterJob table after successful execution of previous steps.

activities.name: SP_MasterJobEnd_Failure_Pipeline
activities.description: This stored procedure receives the MasterProcessNumber as input and updates the status of the MasterJob table after failed execution of previous steps.

activities.name: Lookup_KeyValueConfig
activities.description:
This LookUp calls a stored procedure which
pulls the key/value pairs

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('WebHookFull') AS WebHookFull,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('WebHookIncremental') AS WebHookIncremental,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('AnalysisServicesServer') AS AnalysisServicesServer,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('AzureSQLServerName') AS AzureSQLServerName,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('AzureSQLDatabaseName') AS AzureSQLDatabaseName,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('SubscriptionID') AS SubscriptionID,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('ResourceGroupName') AS ResourceGroupName,
           dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('SQLComputeSizeHigh') AS SQLComputeSizeHigh,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('SQLComputeSizeLow') AS SQLComputeSizeLow

activities.name: Lookup_KeyValueConfig
activities.description:
This LookUp calls a stored procedure which
pulls the key/value pairs

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [dbo].[udf_GetETLConfiguration]('AzureSQLServerName') AS AzureSQLServerName,

	   [dbo].[udf_GetETLConfiguration]('SubscriptionID') AS SubscriptionID,
	   [dbo].[udf_GetETLConfiguration]('ResourceGroupName') AS ResourceGroupName

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [dbo].[udf_GetETLConfiguration]('AzureSQLServerName') AS AzureSQLServerName,
	   [dbo].[udf_GetETLConfiguration]('AzureSQLDatabaseName') AS AzureSQLDatabaseName,
	   [dbo].[udf_GetETLConfiguration]('SubscriptionID') AS SubscriptionID,
	   [dbo].[udf_GetETLConfiguration]('ResourceGroupName') AS ResourceGroupName,
           dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('SQLComputeSizeHigh') AS SQLComputeSizeHigh,
	   dbo.udf_GetETLConfiguration('SQLComputeSizeLow') AS SQLComputeSizeLow

activities.name: LookUp_JobConfigurationMetadataList
activities.description: This LookUp calls a stored procedure and returns the metadata for the DB2 tables that need to be copied to Azure Data Lake

activities.name: ForEach_CopyStagingRaw
activities.description: This ForEach loops through the metadata list and copies data nto Staging and Raw in Azure Data Lake.

activities.name: Copy_ADLStaging_ADLRaw
activities.description: This activity copies data from the ADL Staging location into a Raw storage folder. File path and name are dynamically derived from the Metadata lookup.

activities.name: LookUp_JobTableLogStart
activities.description: This LookUp calls a stored procedure which updates the status in the JobTableLog for each table being copied and returns JobTableLogID.

activities.name: SP_JobTableLogEnd_Success
activities.description: This stored procedure updates the JobTableLog status after successful execution of previous steps.

activities.name: SP_JobTableLogEnd_Failure3
activities.description: This stored procedures updates the status of the JobTableLog failed execution of previous steps.

activities.name: SP_JobTableLogEnd_Failure2
activities.description: This stored procedures updates the status of the JobTableLog failed execution of previous steps.

activities.name: Delete_ExistingStaging
activities.description: This activity deletes all existing files in the destination staging folder for each file being copied.

activities.name: Delete_ExistingRaw
activities.description: This activity deletes files that have the same start time as the current run (i.e. only when this is a rerun). Therefore, most of the time this activity will not delete any files and will fail. The pipeline will continue upon completion of this activity - not success.

activities.name: Copy_DB2_ADLStaging_3002
activities.description: A query returns applicable data for each from DB2 which is then copied into Azure Data Lake in a staging folder. File path and name are dynamically derived from the Metadata lookup.

activities.name: SP_JobTableLogUpdate_3002
activities.description: This stored procedure updates the JobTableLog with the SQL statement used and the number of rows read after successful execution of the copy from DB2 to staging

defaultActivities.name: Copy_DB2_ADLStaging_Default
defaultActivities.description: A query returns applicable data for each from DB2 which is then copied into Azure Data Lake in a staging folder. File path and name are dynamically derived from the Metadata lookup.

defaultActivities.name: SP_JobTableLogUpdate_Default
defaultActivities.description: This stored procedure updates the JobTableLog with the SQL statement used and the number of rows read after successful execution of the copy from DB2 to staging

activities.name: LookUp_DB2SelectSql
activities.description: Using a stored procedure, outputs correct SQL to use to select rows from DB2

activities.name: SP_MetadataListUpdate
activities.description: This stored procedure updates the JobTableLog status after successful execution of previous steps.

activities.name: SP_JobTableLogEnd_Failure5
activities.description: This stored procedures updates the status of the JobTableLog failed execution of previous steps.

activities.name: SP_JobTableLogEnd_Failure4
activities.description: This stored procedures updates the status of the JobTableLog failed execution of previous steps.

activities.name: SP_MasterJobEnd_Failure
activities.description: This stored procedure receives the MasterProcessNumber as input and updates the status of the MasterJob table after failed execution of previous steps.

properties.description: This pipeline is used to copy data from DB2 to Azure Data Lake for both Staging and Raw storage. Several stored procedures are called to update logging and return metadata for the data that needs to be copied.

activities.name: LookUp_MasterJobStart
activities.description: This LookUp calls a stored procedure which creates the ETL.JobMaster status row and returns the MasterProcessNumber

ifFalseActivities.name: SP_MasterJobEnd_Failure_Pipeline_BadRestCall
ifFalseActivities.description: This stored procedure receives the MasterProcessNumber as input and updates the status of the MasterJob table after failed execution of previous steps.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP_MasterJobEnd_Failure_Pipeline
ifTrueActivities.description: This stored procedure receives the MasterProcessNumber as input and updates the status of the MasterJob table after failed execution of previous steps.

activities.name: SP_MasterJobEnd_Failure_Pipeline_copy
activities.description: This stored procedure receives the MasterProcessNumber as input and updates the status of the MasterJob table after failed execution of previous steps.
